## Project: obision-store
GNOME GTK4/Libadwaita application store manager using TypeScript with GJS runtime.

Architecture:
- Service layer with singleton pattern and subscriptions
- Separate interfaces folder
- Components for UI
- GTK4 + Libadwaita for modern GNOME UI
- GSettings for configuration
- Meson for installation, npm for development
